thread.title: Convenient, Comfortable and Generously Sized Room
thread.title_full: Convenient, Comfortable and Generously Sized Room - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Owain B
title: Convenient, Comfortable and Generously Sized Room
text:
An excellently-located hotel when arriving at Paddington Station (only a 5-10minute walk), and only a 5-10minute walk to Hyde Park. The twin room was very comfortable and an excellent size, especially considering its location in London. All the amenities of a good hotel room with well-considered extras including a mini-fridge. The hotel itself is very well looked-after by the maintenance and service staff so please give them my praise! A very nice breakfast included which was another credit to the hotel. I would definitely stay here again if looking to stay in the Paddington or Hyde Park area. Thanks for a pleasant stay.
Room Tip: Higher floors are likely to be quieter. See more room tips
